content: CITI PremierMiles Visa Card Travel Insurance Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Sep 2018Does anyone has tried Citi Premier Miles Travel Insurance by AXA? It seems like it covers the basics at least. Did you buy any extra insurance on top of it?I am visiting Thailand and have bought my tickets on Citi Card but not sure about AXA insurance so far.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Oct 2018Well, consider your needs for the trip, look at the coverage via the card, their terms and conditions and see if it is suitable. If not, it'll be a good idea to get a separate coverage. 0 comments0
